snippet.title: [Wii]Toshinden[闘真伝] (JPN) Specials/Transformations/Ultimates BEST QUALITY
snippet.description:
Pick up your weapons and fight until you drop. Beautifully drawn characters and unique weapons, this game will have even the most pacifists of you itching with the desire to unleash a few combos on your opponents.

Each fighter have their reasons to participate in the tournament, some wants to protect their families, some for justice, others for ambition. Play the game as different characters and travel the rich, colorful world of Toshinden.

Depending on which character you choose and how you levelled up your weapons, you can summon dragons, transform your suit of armor or simply unleash the full power of your blade.

High speed combat, a large variety of skills and characters voiced by famous seiyuus such as Kuwahara Houko and Seki Tomokazu, this game is a must get.
